title: Need help identifying this font. PLEASE!
content:
I did a website a while ago, and the PSD file got lost. Now I can't figure out what font this is. It is the text that says "New client coupon, click here for $5 off any service". Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bluesquare.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416001331/http:/typophile.com/files/bluesquare.gif) | 15.88 KB |
author: dcqtpi

comments.content:
It must be **[Casual](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416001331/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Casual%20-%20Regular&fid=2a6e9ef99a4b789ed3b583cdb4bce4b3&fsize=60&text=new%20client%20coupon&fit=1)** by A.J. Palmer (1997, Free for Personal Use)

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416001331/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
